content: With the Tridacna Pendant equipped, all of your spell cooldowns will be reduced slightly, which is key when fighting some of the bosses in Chapter 2 and beyond, as the difficulty ramps up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tridacna_Pendant.md', within the main section titled 'Tridacna Pendant'.
The content is as follows:
With the Tridacna Pendant equipped, all of your spell cooldowns will be reduced slightly, which is key when fighting some of the bosses in Chapter 2 and beyond, as the difficulty ramps up.
